gitify-app/gitify

GitHub notifications in your menu bar

View on index

Related repos

  • macOS menu bar app for Apple Reminders
  • monitors GitHub repos for new releases, sends notifications via email or messaging apps
  • tips and templates for customizing your GitHub profile
  • turn emails into push notifications for your devices
  • Sends notifications to many services
  • SwiftUI library for native iOS system notifications
  • Menu bar app for calendar and reminders
  • iOS app for GitHub Gist
  • command-line tool to visualize Git activity
  • Terminal-based git interface for managing repositories with keyboard shortcuts and interactive views
